title: (x) Sans serif used for fashion credits in Elle magazine - Interstate {Tiff}
content:
Just wondering if anyone could identify this face used for fashion credits in Elle.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [credit.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203328/http:/typophile.com/files/credit.jpg) | 32.32 KB |

author: sthurer

comments.content: Are you serious? Interstate is my favorite font. At least I’m consistent.
